last_episode_to_air.name: From the Top
last_episode_to_air.overview: Reality will cease to exist unless a selfless hero makes the ultimate sacrifice. But will it be enough to reverse the damage Nine caused to the universe?

name: Sonic Prime
overview: When an explosive battle with Dr. Eggman shatters the universe, Sonic races through parallel dimensions to reconnect with his friends and save the world.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: In this high-speed animated adventure, Sonic the Hedgehog travels through multiple dimensions to collect Prism Shards and piece together the universe.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: With the help of his ragtag group of Shatterverse allies, Sonic battles the Chaos Council for control of the powerful Paradox Prism, one Shard at a time.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: When Nine steals the Paradox Prism to create a world all for himself, Sonic must team up with unlikely allies to protect the Shatterverse as he knows it.

tagline: The world he knows is about to shatter.

episodes.name: Shattered
episodes.overview: A collision with the Paradox Prism sends Sonic to a parallel world called New Yoke City, where the dull environment looks oddly familiar.

episodes.name: The Yoke's on You
episodes.overview: A power outage gives two rebels a chance to break into a lab where the Chaos Council is studying Sonic's strange connection to their energy source.

episodes.name: Escape from New Yoke
episodes.overview: To secure the Prism Shard, the rebels battle the Chaos Council. Then Sonic makes a startling discovery about the events that shattered his world.

episodes.name: Unwelcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: In a dimension called the Boscage Maze, Sonic runs into tree-dwelling versions of his friends who warn him of a monster that lives on the jungle floor.

episodes.name: Barking Up the Wrong Tree
episodes.overview: To find his way back to the right dimension, Sonic must battle the jungle monster who waged war on his friends and capture the powerful Prism Shard.

episodes.name: Situation: Grim
episodes.overview: Back in New Yoke, Sonic desperately tries to convince Nine to join the Resistance, but Nine is focused on building a brand-new home.

episodes.name: It Takes One to No Place
episodes.overview: In the tropical No Place, Sonic meets a friendly band of pirates and their mysterious captain, who loves to party.

episodes.name: There's No ARRGH in "Team"
episodes.overview: As Sonic's crew races to the Prism Shard, they quickly realize they're not the only ones after it. There's only one way to win — they gotta go fast!

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: In this high-speed animated adventure, Sonic the Hedgehog travels through multiple dimensions to collect Prism Shards and piece together the universe.

episodes.name: Avoid the Void
episodes.overview: Shadow ambushes Sonic in the void of the Shatterverse to confront his rival about the destruction of Green Hill — and take matters into his own hands.

episodes.name: Battle in the Boscage
episodes.overview: As the Chaos Council searches for the Boscage Prism Shard, Sonic realizes there's only one way to stop the robots from destroying the forest: a battle.

episodes.name: Second Wind
episodes.overview: To save Captain Dread's crew and recapture the Shard, Sonic will have to do what he does best: act fast. Luckily he has help from an unexpected ally.

episodes.name: No Way Out
episodes.overview: Friends become foes when Captain Dread's crew questions Sonic's loyalties. Then, a battle on the high seas breaks out over possession of the Shard.

episodes.name: A Madness to Their Methods
episodes.overview: The Chaos Council returns to New Yoke City more powerful than ever, forcing the rebels to come out of the shadows and bring a fight to their front door.

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Sonic meets his match in Chaos Sonic, a robot version of himself designed to never fail. Meanwhile, the Chaos Council decides to expand their empire.

episodes.name: Cracking Down
episodes.overview: The key to reassembling the Paradox Prism lies in one of the Shatterspaces. But can Nine and Sonic find a portal to safely transport the Shards there?

episodes.name: Ghost of a Chance
episodes.overview: While Nine reassembles the Paradox Prism, Shadow and Sonic battle the Council to buy more time — but there's one big surprise they weren't counting on.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: With the help of his ragtag group of Shatterverse allies, Sonic battles the Chaos Council for control of the powerful Paradox Prism, one Shard at a time.

episodes.name: Grim Tidings
episodes.overview: With the Paradox Prism in his hands, Nine begins building the Grim into his own personal paradise — unless Sonic and Shadow can convince him otherwise.

episodes.name: Dome Sweet Dome
episodes.overview: To get help in the fight against Nine and his winged lackeys, Sonic heads to New Yoke and forms an allegiance with the very last people he ever expected.

episodes.name: No Escape
episodes.overview: Sonic races to No Place to save the pirates before their world collapses, but Nine still needs Sonic's energy to power the Paradox Prism.

episodes.name: Nine's Lives
episodes.overview: Sonic must learn to give up some control if he's going to defeat Nine on the battlefield. The first step? Letting the team take over.

episodes.name: Home Sick Home
episodes.overview: To beat the biggest bot on the battlefield and get one step closer to Nine, Sonic needs to move fast — and accept a little help from his friends.

episodes.name: The Devil Is in the Tails
episodes.overview: Sonic discovers a new ability that may be the key to defeating Nine. But Nine's endless army has only one purpose: to capture Sonic's energy.

episodes.name: From the Top
episodes.overview: Reality will cease to exist unless a selfless hero makes the ultimate sacrifice. But will it be enough to reverse the damage Nine caused to the universe?

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: When Nine steals the Paradox Prism to create a world all for himself, Sonic must team up with unlikely allies to protect the Shatterverse as he knows it.
